name.ja: <ruby>清<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>浄<rt>じょう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>蛇<rt>へび</rt></ruby><ruby>姫<rt>ひめ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK equal to [the number of face-up LIGHT Attribute monsters on your field] x 600 until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 3 face-up monsters on your field, draw 1 card.
